Articles.Content:
Hello!

I\'ve been playing the demo for the past couple of weeks, and only bought the game just this last weekend. I like this game and where it\'s going. <] People should start playing this game so they can fully appreciate the work of NASA and other space programs. It\'s already hard enough with unlimited budget; I can\'t imagine what the space programs can do with reduced budgets!

We should force American politicians to play this game. x]

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
